scripts.client:ps: cd app/client && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.server:ps: cd app/server && npm run dev && cd ../..
scripts.build:ps: cd app/client && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.start:ps: start npm run server:ps && start npm run client:ps
scripts.install:ps: npm i && cd app/client && npm i && cd ../server && npm i && cd ../..
scripts.db:migrate:ps: cd app/server && npm run migrate && cd ../..
scripts.db:rollback:ps: cd app/server && npm run rollback && cd ../..
scripts.test:ps: cd app/client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test && cd ../..
scripts.clean:ps:
if exist app\client\dist rd /s /q app\client\dist && if exist app\client
ode_modules rd /s /q app\client
ode_modules && if exist app\server
ode_modules rd /s /q app\server
ode_modules && if exist node_modules rd /s /q node_modules
scripts.lint:ps: cd app/client && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint && cd ../..
scripts.deploy:ps: npm run build:ps && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to production" && git push heroku main
